description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Two tribes go to war in this strategy game that recreates the tension and paranoia of the cold war era. Build bases and spy on your enemy, each side waiting for the best moment to push the button first. Once war is on, gauge the benefits of offense versus defense as you activate your bases. Can you outwit the computer and win a nuclear war?
